Chinese.name: EdgeOne APK 动态打包
Chinese.description: 本示例使用 COS 作为触发器，当在 COS 上传 apk 母包，会触发云函数执行生成预处理后的 apk 包，并将该包输出到 COS 指定的目录。
Chinese.attention: 在使用本示例代码时需要在函数环境变量里配置母包处理后输出到COS的目录 outputPath 和签名方式 packVersion，另外会使用到运行角色，需要确保角色有COS存储桶的读写权限。

English.name: EdgeOneAPKDynamicPackaging
English.description: This example uses COS as a trigger. When the origin APK is uploaded to COS, it triggers a cloud function to generate a preprocessed APK package, which is then output to the specified directory in COS.
English.attention: When using this example code, you need to configure the output directory `outputPath` for the processed base package and the signature method `packVersion` in the function environment variables. In addition, the runtime role will be used, and you need to ensure that the role has read and write permissions for the COS bucket.
